comments: this teacher is not helpful at all and very imcomprehensible. whenever i had a question he would get annoyed and make me look stupid if i needed clarification. he thinks he\'s funny but he is sooo wrong! dont take this teacher he\'ll make your blood boil!!!

This professor is a nice guy but he should not be teaching this course. If you do not understand math very well you will not do well in his class. He is way to smart to teach this class and he can not get down to my level. I do not even ask question because he gets to upset. Do not take this class is you need math to be explained to you.

My impression is that he expects you to understand what he is talking about and talks down to you if you have a question and ask for additional clarification. He may be a smar man but does not understand they we may not know what he is talking about.

Very smart Man but he can not teach. He does not finish his sentences before he is on to the next one. Very confusing. This is a last chance teacher. Please if you need a Professor to be clear and ready to help he is not for you. If you all ready know the stuff then you are good to go. He is nice just can not teach if you do not know the math
